# mass_function { #sim_2024.mass_function }

```python
mass_function(self, sup, values)
```

funcion de masa

Clase de abstracción de una función de masa de probabilidad.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                          | Default    |
|--------|--------|------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| sup    | list   | support of mass function                             | _required_ |
| values | list   | values of mass function in the same order as support | _required_ |
